#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#define L int
#define LL int
L hcf[101] = {0} , lcm[101] = {0} ;
int gcd(int a ,int b)
{
	if(b==0)return a;
	else return gcd(b,a%b);
}
L main()
{
	L n ;
	scanf("%d",&n) ;
	for(int i = 1 ; i<=n ;++i )
	{
		scanf("%d",&hcf[i]);
		scanf("%d",&lcm[i]);
	}
	int hc = 0 , prod = 1 ;
	for(int i = 1 ; i<=n ; ++i )
	hc = gcd(hcf[i],hc) ;
	for(int i = 1 ; i<=n ; ++i )
	prod = ( prod * lcm[i] )/gcd( prod,lcm[i] ) ; 
	printf("%d/",hc);
	printf("%d\n",prod);
        return 0 ;
}
